42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah said:' whoever keeps a dog except one that is trained for hunting or a dog for herding livestock, two Qirats will be deducted from his reward each day

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي إِمْسَاكِ الْكَلْبِ لِلصَّيْدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Concession For Keeping Dogs For Hunting
